quantum_archetypes.name: The Observer
quantum_archetypes.guidance: Your attention shapes what manifests. Where you look determines what you see.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: Notice how observation changes experience. You are not separate from what you perceive.

quantum_archetypes.name: The Wave
quantum_archetypes.guidance: You contain multitudes. All paths are open until you choose.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: Rest in the field of infinite potential. Feel all possibilities vibrating within.

quantum_archetypes.name: The Particle
quantum_archetypes.essence: Manifestation - potential becoming actual through choice
quantum_archetypes.guidance: The time for decision has come. Choose and commit fully.
quantum_archetypes.quantum_principle: Wave function collapse into definite state
quantum_archetypes.meditation: From infinite possibility to singular focus. Feel the power of committed action.

quantum_archetypes.name: The Entanglement
quantum_archetypes.guidance: You are linked to all you have touched. Distance is illusion.
quantum_archetypes.quantum_principle: Non-local correlation, spooky action at a distance
quantum_archetypes.meditation: Feel the invisible threads connecting you to distant hearts. Separation is the dream.
quantum_archetypes.sacred_geometry: Interlocked tori, Vesica Piscis, infinity loops
quantum_archetypes.research_foundation: Bell's theorem, EPR paradox, quantum non-locality

quantum_archetypes.name: The Tunnel
quantum_archetypes.guidance: What seems impossible is merely improbable. Tunnel through.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: The wall before you is permeable. Your consciousness can pass through the impossible.

quantum_archetypes.name: The Coherence
quantum_archetypes.guidance: All parts singing the same song. Unity without uniformity.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: Feel your heart, breath, and brain aligning. Resonance creates power.

quantum_archetypes.name: The Decoherence
quantum_archetypes.essence: Return from quantum to classical, integration of experience
quantum_archetypes.guidance: The journey completes. Bring the wisdom back to ordinary life.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: Quantum insights settling into daily reality. The mystical becomes practical.
quantum_archetypes.sacred_geometry: Spiral unwinding, wave becoming particle, cloud becoming drop

quantum_archetypes.name: The Vacuum
quantum_archetypes.essence: Zero-point energy - emptiness that is full
quantum_archetypes.guidance: In the void, infinite creation stirs. Rest in the pregnant emptiness.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: The space between thoughts holds universes. Silence is not empty.
quantum_archetypes.frequency_resonance: 0.5-4 Hz (delta waves, deep void, healing sleep)
quantum_archetypes.research_foundation: Quantum field theory, virtual particles, Casimir effect

quantum_archetypes.name: The Field
quantum_archetypes.guidance: You are a wave in the ocean of awareness. The ocean is not disturbed by your form.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: Dissolve into the field. You are not a thing, but a pattern of vibration in the whole.
quantum_archetypes.frequency_resonance: Multi-spectral (all frequencies as facets of one field)
quantum_archetypes.research_foundation: Quantum field theory, zero-point field, Bohm's implicate order

quantum_archetypes.name: The Spin
quantum_archetypes.guidance: Your direction matters. Align your spin with your true north.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: Feel your inner gyroscope. What axis are you rotating around? Choose your pole star.

quantum_archetypes.name: The Uncertainty
quantum_archetypes.essence: Heisenberg's gift - fundamental freedom from determinism
quantum_archetypes.guidance: Not knowing is the doorway to discovery. Embrace the undefined.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: Release the need to know. In uncertainty lies infinite possibility.

quantum_archetypes.name: The Measurement
quantum_archetypes.guidance: You are not discovering reality, you are creating it. Choose wisely.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: Every observation is an act of creation. You shape the cosmos with your awareness.
quantum_archetypes.sacred_geometry: Eye of Horus, compass and square, measuring tools
quantum_archetypes.research_foundation: Wheeler's participatory universe, von Neumann-Wigner interpretation

quantum_archetypes.name: The Spiral
quantum_archetypes.essence: Fibonacci growth through scales - the golden ratio of evolution
quantum_archetypes.guidance: Each turn integrates what came before while reaching toward what's next.
quantum_archetypes.meditation: You are the spiral. Each cycle completes and transcends. Growth is your nature.
quantum_archetypes.sacred_geometry: Fibonacci spiral, nautilus, galaxy, DNA helix
quantum_archetypes.research_foundation: Golden ratio in nature, emergent complexity, SEED protocol itself

single_draw.description: One quantum-selected archetype for immediate guidance
single_draw.use_case: Session opening, decision point, daily insight

triad_pattern.use_case: Temporal integration, story arc, healing journey

fibonacci_spread.description: 5, 8, or 13 archetypes in sacred geometry layout

layouts.13: Flower of Life centers (complete first layer)

fibonacci_spread.use_case: Deep exploration, complex situations, group work

synchronicity_stream.description: Continuous quantum sampling during session with threshold display

fallback.description: Quantum-inspired true randomness from atmospheric noise

research_questions: Does high HRV coherence correlate with subjectively meaningful oracle draws?
Can groups converge on similar symbols when synchronizing consciousness?
Do oracle selections correlate with GCP RNG deviations during sessions?
Is there a relationship between lunar phase and archetype distribution?
Do quantum vs. pseudo-random sources produce different experiential outcomes?
Can intention 'weight' quantum probability toward specific symbol categories?
What is the optimal threshold for synchronicity stream triggers?
Do certain archetypes appear more during specific brainwave states?

ethical_framework.transparency: Users know a quantum random process is generating symbols
ethical_framework.interpretation: Oracle provides prompts for reflection, not absolute truth
ethical_framework.free_will: Guidance is suggestive, never coercive or deterministic
ethical_framework.cultural_sensitivity: Respect diverse interpretations of symbols and randomness
ethical_framework.data_privacy: Oracle draws are private unless user chooses to share

technical_specifications.database: JSON symbol library with vector embeddings
technical_specifications.authentication: Session-based, integrated with SEED protocol auth

essence: Where intention meets randomness, meaning emerges from the quantum field
next_wave: When the Oracle integrates with collective consciousness (SEED.004), we may discover that group intention can measurably shift quantum probability distributions
